articles.title: U.S. billionaire financier Thomas Lee dies at 78, family says - CNBC
articles.description: American billionaire financier Thomas H. Lee, considered a pioneer of private equity investment and leveraged buyouts, died at the age of 78.
articles.content: American billionaire financier Thomas H. Lee, considered a pioneer of private equity investment and leveraged buyouts, died at the age of 78, his family said in a statement on Thursday, without notin… [+1825 chars]

articles.title: Meghan and Harry’s approval rating slumps - Sky News Australia
articles.description: New polling data by American magazine Newsweek has revealed that Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are now even less popular in the United States than Prince Andrew.
